Hi Mark,

I believe this will be easy to fix. Probably it will just have to be ignored.
One question: Do you exit Eclipse while a (connected) CDO Editor is still open?

Cheers
/Eike

Mark,

Don't worry, this is an expected exception.
Maybe the logging categorie should be changed to DEBUG here.
But I'll change the code to explicitely check whether the channel to be removed is still existing.

Cheers
/Eike
